Indio.KJJZ:
KJJZ (95.9 MHz) is a 1.75 kW Class A FM commercial radio station licensed to Indian Wells, California and broadcasting to the greater Coachella Valley and the Morongo Basin of California. KJJZ airs a soft adult contemporary music format branded as KOOL 95.9 FM.


== History ==
KJJZ's previous call letters, KAJR, were the initials of its owners, Art and Jeannie Rivkin. The station is located in the Palm Desert studios of Marker Broadcasting, also the owner of KPLM, KMRJ and KRHQ. KRHQ is located at 102.3, where the call letters KJJZ were originally assigned.
